response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique value it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to your business.

Considering the immense benefits this product provides, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell the product to you for $1,200,000, a special discount considering its market value. This offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to acquire such a high-quality product without compromising on cost.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions or provide additional information that might help you make an informed decision.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
